title: Social Sector Practical Skill Development Program Using Web-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Provision of blended learning environments utilizing digital devices for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can achieve a success rate of 80% or higher in solving real-world problems in the social sciences using web-based tools.
Learners achieve a pre-post academic achievement index of 0.71 or higher in a blended learning environment.
Learners report an 85% or higher satisfaction rate with web-based learning materials.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
